snippet: The Barry Crane Top 500 award goes to the player who has won the most master points in a calendar year. The winner in 2011 was Chris Compton of Dallas.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on deal played by Barry Crane Top 500 award winner Chris Compton at tournament in Las Vegas.
lead_paragraph: The Barry Crane Top 500 award goes to the player who has won the most master points in a calendar year. The winner in 2011 was Chris Compton of Dallas.

headline.seo: In Bridge, Chris Compton Offers an Unusual Deal
headline.main: An Award-Winning Player Shares an Unusual Deal
headline.print_headline: An Award-Winning Player Shares an Unusual Deal
